item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, August 31, 2024 at 11:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Building LLMs from the Ground Up: A 3-Hour Coding Workshop (76 points | 3 comments)
2. An Ode to My 5-Year-Old Samsung Galaxy S10e (9 points | discuss)
3. Harder Drive: hard drives we didn't want, or need [video] (2022) (238 points | 41 comments)
4. Boox Palma Review: A Phone-Sized E-Ink Android Device That Isn't a Phone (7 points | discuss)
5. WatchYourLAN: Lightweight Network IP Scanner (55 points | 1 comment)
6. Did your car witness a crime? (135 points | 315 comments)
7. One Million new Bluesky users in 3 days (31 points | 9 comments)
8. Greece announces new rules banning mobile phones in schools from September (79 points | 33 comments)
9. Compilation of JavaScript to WASM, Part 2: Ahead-of-Time vs. JIT (54 points | discuss)
10. Continue (YC S23) Is Hiring a Software Engineer in San Francisco ( | hide)
11. Signals for Tailwind CSS (styling based on ancestor state via style queries) (31 points | 34 comments)
12. Landlords Face a $1.5T Commercial Real Estate Maturity Wall (42 points | 12 comments)
13. Show HN: A retro terminal text editor for GNU/Linux coded in C (C-edit) (110 points | 25 comments)
14. Lucee: A light-weight dynamic CFML scripting language for the JVM (52 points | 22 comments)
15. Client-side QR code generator with SVG output (30 points | 3 comments)
16. The Threat to OpenAI (64 points | 64 comments)
17. Neutral beam microscopy using magnetic beam spin encoding (4 points | discuss)
18. Nearly half of Nvidia's revenue comes from four mystery whales each buying $3B+ (204 points | 195 comments)
19. Is my vision that bad? No, it's just a bug in Apple's Calculator (535 points | 342 comments)
20. Federal Appeals Court Once Again Rejects Blanket Gun Ban for Cannabis Consumers (22 points | 3 comments)
21. Show HN: Typeform alternative, turns Markdown to forms (97 points | 30 comments)
22. Neo – Futuristic Matrix Messenger (19 points | 6 comments)
23. Buy, Borrow, Die – Explained (246 points | 181 comments)
24. Building Bubbletea Programs (124 points | 33 comments)
25. My fake job in Y2K preparedness (81 points | 57 comments)
26. Rediscovering the Small Web (2020) (220 points | 55 comments)
27. Seeing America by train (87 points | 72 comments)
28. Percona Everest: open-source automated database provisioning and management (8 points | discuss)
29. Las Vegas police could boycott working NFL games over new facial ID policy (31 points | 31 comments)
30. Karpathy on Software 2.0 (2017) (36 points | 7 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, August 31, 2024 at 11:15 PM UTC
